    if (userPackage)
    {
         webLimit =userPackage.Profile_Package_Setting__r.Web_Description_Limit__c;
         printLimit=userPackage.Profile_Package_Setting__r.Print_Description_Limit__c;
    }
    else
    { 
        webLimit =profilePackageDefault.Web_Description_Limit__c;
        printLimit=profilePackageDefault.Print_Description_Limit__c;
    }

    removePlugins: 'link,pagebreak,pastetext,pastefromword,preview,removeformat,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,table,tabletools,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,format,horizontalrule,htmlwriter,iframe,image,menubutton,language,magicline,maximize,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,showblocks,showborders,sourcearea,specialchar,scayt,wsc,stylescombo,tab,table,tabletools,horizontalrule,blockquote,justify,font,bidi'

var ck;
var objEditor = function(containerid,data,action) 
{
    //console.log('data ' +data);
        if(action=='getData')
    	{
    	    //console.log('1');
    		return CKEDITOR.instances[containerid].getData(); 
    	}
    	else
    	{
    	       //console.log('2');
            	if(containerid && action!='setData')
            	{
            	//console.log('3');
            	    setTimeout(function(){
                	    var bodyEditor =  CKEDITOR.replace(containerid, window.CKSettings); 
                	   // Handle when the HTML changes.
                        bodyEditor.on('key', function (e) {
                        var html= CKEDITOR.instances[containerid].getData();
                        html = html.replace(/<\/p><p>/g, ' ');
                        html = html.replace(/<br \/>/g, ' ');
                        html = html.replace(/&nbsp;/g, ' ');
                        var dom=document.createElement("DIV");
                        dom.innerHTML=html;
                        var plain_text=(dom.textContent || dom.innerText);
                        plain_text = plain_text.replace(/  +/g, ' ');
                        if (typeof plain_text.trim !== 'function') {
                            plain_text.trim = function() {
                                return this.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g, ''); 
                            };
                        }
                        plain_text = plain_text.trim();
                        var res = '';
                        var resLength=0;
                        if(plain_text!='')
                        {
                          res = plain_text.split(" ");
                          resLength=res.length;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            resLength=0;
                        }
                        var deleteKey = 46;
            			var backspaceKey = 8;
            			var keyCode = e.data.keyCode;
                            if(containerid=='editor1')
                            {   
                                var msg='';
                                if(!plain_text){
                                 msg=webLimit+' out of  '+webLimit+' words remaining';
                                }
                                else{
                                 msg=webLimit-resLength+' out of  '+webLimit+' words remaining';
                                }
                                if((webLimit-resLength)+1<=0)
                                { 
                                    msg='You have reached the word limit for web description';
                                    if (keyCode === deleteKey || keyCode === backspaceKey) {
                        				return true;
                        			}
                        			else
                        			{
                        			   e.data.domEvent.preventDefault();
                        			}
                                }
                                $('.WordCount1').text(msg);
                            }
                            if(containerid=='editor2')
                            {
                                var msg='';
                                if(!plain_text){
                                 msg=printLimit+' out of '+printLimit+' words remaining';
                                }
                                else{
                                 msg=printLimit-resLength+' out of '+printLimit+' words remaining';
                                }
                                if((printLimit-resLength)+1<=0)
                                {
                                    msg='You have reached the word limit for print description';
                                   if (keyCode === deleteKey || keyCode === backspaceKey) {
                        				return true;
                        			}
                        			else
                        			{
                        			   e.data.domEvent.preventDefault();
                        			}
                                }
                                $('.WordCount2').text(msg);
                            }
                            
                        });
                    },500);
            	}
            	else if(action=='setData')
            	{
            	  //var html= CKEDITOR.instances[containerid].setData(data); 
            	  CKEDITOR.instances[containerid].setData(data);
            	} 
    	}
}

</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="mainCSS" cachelocation="false"/><cssitem location="inline" name="NewPageStyles" cachelocation="false">/*Product Listings Tab Styles*/
.cc-product-listings-added {
    padding:20px
}
.cc-product-listings-added-text {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 1.3em;
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-anchor {
    margin-top:5px;
    margin-bottom:5px;
    margin-left:2px;
    margin-right:2px;
}
.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav {
    padding: 0 0 0 8px;
}

/*Style guid overide rules for tables*/
.cc-profile-table thead {
    display: none;
}
.cc-profile-table .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}
.cc-profile-table tr {
    width:100%;
}
.cc-profile-table td {
    text-align: left;
}
.cc-profile-table td:first-child {
    text-align: right;
}
/* Flip position of text and filter sets in tables*/
.cc-profile-table { 
    direction: rtl; 
}
.cc-profile-table > .nx-fieldtext { 
    direction: ltr; 
}
.cc-profile-table .nx-fieldtext a,
.cc-profile-table .nx-fieldtext a:hover{ 
    text-decoration:none;
    color: #000;
    font-weight: bold;
}
/* Overide pop styles*/
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar {
    background:#fff;
}
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-button.ui-dialog-titlebar-close .ui-icon {
    color:#000;
}
/* Overide pop up feild editor styles*/
.cc-popup-field-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width:10%;
    padding-right:10px;
    text-align: right;
}
.cc-popup-field-editor .nx-basicfieldeditor-item {
    padding: 0;
}
.cc-popup-field-editor div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-body>div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field, div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field {
    width:88%;
}
/*force align columns to align with titles in Company Info feild editor */
.cc-profile-company-info .nx-basicfieldeditor-item {
    padding:0px;
}
/* Overide pop up title bar styles*/
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar {
    margin: 30px;
    position: relative;
    color: #333333;
    font-weight:bold;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding-bottom:12px;
    padding-left:0px;
    padding-top:0px;
    border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(153, 153, 153)
}
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-button.ui-dialog-titlebar-close .ui-icon {
    color: #999999;
}
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar .ui-button.ui-dialog-titlebar-close {
    margin: 0.4em -0.1em;
    padding:0;
}
.cc-profile-popup-wrapper {
    padding-top:30px;
    padding-right:20px;
    padding-left:20px;
}
/* Overide rich text editor heights*/
.cc-profile-rich-text .nx-richtext-input {
    height: 183px;
}
/*Overide built in CKEDITOR styles*/
.cke_chrome {
    display: block;
    padding: 0;
    border: 1px solid #a1a1a1;
    box-shadow: none;
}
i.nx-skootable-buttonicon-visible {
    color: #555;
}
.cke_toolbar_break {
    clear:none;
}

.nx-field{
    width: 50%;
    margin-left: -49px;
}

}

}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rowSnippetForShowSpecial" cachelocation="false">/*
    ** Row action snippet that will perfomr the same action as roa action when user click on the name field.
    ** this snippet is called as field renderer in name field
*/
var ROW_ACTION_ICON = 'sk-icon-popup';
var field = arguments[0],
    value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
    $ = skuid.$;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);
// If we're NOT in edit mode, then have the "link" action show a popup
if (field.mode !== 'edit') {
    if (ROW_ACTION_ICON) {
        field.element.find('a').attr('href','#').on('click',function(){
            var closestTr = field.element.closest('tr');
            var tds = closestTr.children('td');
            var actionsCell;
            if (tds.length) {
                if (tds.first().find('input[type="checkbox"]').length) {
                    actionsCell = tds[1];
                } else {
                    actionsCell = tds[0];
                }
            }
            if (actionsCell) {
                var rowAction = $(actionsCell).find('.'+ROW_ACTION_ICON);
                if (rowAction) {
                    // Trigger the click action
                    rowAction.click();
                }
            }
        });
    }
}
